sqlReaderQuery.value:
select d.* , s.* 
FROM sqlserver_conf s
INNER JOIN Data_Load_Ref_Table d
ON s.Source_Name_Conf = d.Source_Name
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Copy_act_Component] cc
ON cc.S_No = d.S_No
WHERE Target_Dir_Type = 'ADLS2' AND d.S_No > (SELECT max(S_No) FROM [dbo].[Copy_act_Component])

select d.* , s.* 
FROM sqlserver_conf s
INNER JOIN Data_Load_Ref_Table d
ON s.Source_Name_Conf = d.Source_Name
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Copy_act_Component] cc
ON cc.S_No = d.S_No
WHERE Target_Dir_Type = 'FileSystem' AND d.S_No > (SELECT max(S_No) FROM [dbo].[Copy_act_Component])

properties.description: It's has configuration to Load Multiple Tables data at dynamic level by passing file as source.
It's has configuration to Load Single Table data at dynamic level.

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select c.* , s.* 
FROM sqlserver_conf s
INNER JOIN coe_bussiness_component_table c
ON s.Source_Name_Conf = c.Source_Name
LEFT JOIN [dbo].[Copy_act_Component] cc
ON cc.S_No = c.S_No
WHERE Target_Dir_Type = 'ADLS2' AND c.S_No > (SELECT max(S_No) FROM [dbo].[Copy_act_Component])
